showStackTrace

public static void showStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable e)
Shows a JOptionPane with the stacktrace/backtrace for the Throwable passed in. Useful in GUI applications.

Parameters:
e -

buildForm

public static javax.swing.JPanel buildForm(java.lang.String title,
                                           javax.swing.JComponent... cl)
Creates a form in the form of a JPanel. Fields are dynamically resized when the window size is modified by the user.

Parameters:
title - Title to use in the border. Specify null if you don't want one. Specify empty string if you want just border.
cl - The list of containers to work with. Elements should be in the order, e.g. JLabel1, JTextField1, JLabel 2, JTextField2, etc.
Returns:
A JPanel with a SpringLayout in a form.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If cl.length == 0 || cl.length % 2 == 1
